attributes.action: listen to and engage with online parenting communities when shaping policies that affect families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Much has been made in the news lately about how the upcoming General Election will be won on policies relating to the family. We ask the Prime Minister and his government to actually listen to the nation's families when shaping policies, and believe that the best and easiest way to do this is to engage with online parenting communities. Mums - and indeed Dads - with laptops find their voices here. We are not represented by any one individual or self-styled parenting guru. We're a diverse, articulate and opinionated bunch, bursting with opinions, and would appreciate more frequent engagement with the PM. We think he'd appreciate it too...
